front.text: Jul 15 1908. Received yoru letter to-day and will answer it to-morrow evening. I enjoyed it very much. Do not worry now will you? I do not know if you have a card like this or not but if you have you know I can not remember all that I send you. Write when you feel like it. I am well + feeling fine

back.image: Seal with border of blue and white square photos from various locations in New Haven.> Greetings from New Haven.
